issue.title: [JAVA] Implement final ValueVector updates
issue.body:

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1476?focusedCommentId=16250272) by Siddharth Teotia (siddteotia):*
3rd patch for java-vector-refactor branch is in progress. PR should be up by EOD. The bulk of code is already pushed as part of first two patches. Minor changes were needed as part of testing in Dremio. Once the 3rd PR is available, we can work towards merging this branch into master.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1476?focusedCommentId=16254477) by Siddharth Teotia (siddteotia):*
Resolved by https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/1316
